Class DialogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • DialogManager
  • public class DialogManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class DialogManager manages all of the dialog instances involving NPC's and the player. All of the dialog is stored in CONST_DIALOG.xml and the modified version in dialog.xml, to render the process of adding dialog of an NPC easier. This class parses the dialog.xml file to get out the corresponding interaction with the player. Two files are used so that one of them, dialog.xml can be modified to keep track of the player's interactions with the NPCs.
    Version:
    17/11/21
    Author:
    Gabriele Trotta (K21006956)

      • DialogManager

        public DialogManager()
        This constructor is called when no npc is involved in the dialog, so only at the end of the program. We then restore the dialog.xml content to the unchanged format in CONST_DIALOG.xml
